Located right inside Santa Caterina market, this a restaurant with a  farm-to table concept. In a large open kitchen you'll see dozen of chefs creating cuisines from all over the world. You can never get bored with options here, if anything it's pretty overwhelming.You will find almost anything you crave: from local Catalan to Japanese, Mediterranean, Turkish, Thai, Middle-Eastern, Chinese and more. I've been here several times and everything I tried so far was mouthwatering.
